name: Escape the Omnochronom!
description: It's a Rogue-like DotA! Escape the Omnochronom! is a turn based single-player strategy game set in a unique quirky fantasy universe from the designer of Auro: A Monster-Bumping Adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card. GeForce 9600 GS Shader Model 3.0 512 MB or better. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
